name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 7, the Financial Times website: Evidence-based research confirms that Lianhua Qingwen is better than Oseltamivir (Tamiflu) in preventing and treating influenza A.

name: 李老师不是你老师
李老师不是你老师
content:
The real estate market is sluggish. A contractor was unable to pay his employees because he could not get the project payment. So he went to Russia to join the army to pay off his debts.
January 5 (Release) A civil engineering contractor from Shandong, "Lu Lren (net name)", led the workers to complete a batch of work, but the client delayed paying the project payment after the work was completed, resulting in him having no money to pay the workers.
In order to pay off the wages of these migrant workers, he chose to join the army in Russia to make money. During the period, he experienced the cruelty of four months of war, but fortunately, he survived and paid off the workers' wages.
On December 26, he posted a message saying: I have earned enough wages owed to the workers. I have never shed tears in the four months of bloody battles. Today, I saw the payroll and shed tears for the first time.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/6F0osj6HFL

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 7 (Release), Lianjiang, Guangdong. Villagers in Shiling Town said that the local government seized land to build a factory and told the villagers to "start work! Anyone who stops us will be hooked to death!" The villagers and the workers had a physical conflict.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some local netizens said that Pucheng County has transferred special police from other places, and the matter is over. Half of the people involved in the fight have been arrested.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 7, in Zhumadian, Henan Province, villagers from Qihai Township, Shangcai County reported that the local government had occupied the village's collective land to build a crematorium, and that the crematorium was too close to the village. The villagers were worried about environmental pollution and took to the streets to defend their rights. During this period, police forces continued to rush to the scene to provide reinforcements and maintain stability.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the Henan Province 2025 Civil Service Examination Position List, those who have studied, worked or lived abroad for more than six consecutive months and whose experience and political performance while abroad are difficult to examine are not allowed to apply.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In September 2014, Li Dong, an engineer at the Institute of Computer Science of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, published a paper titled "Thoughts on Building a Chinese Artificial Intelligence Corpus with Chinese Characteristics in the New Era", advocating the construction of a corpus with Chinese characteristics. However, even without building a special corpus, the Chinese corpus has become extremely extreme and self-censored due to the existence of censorship and replacement words to circumvent censorship. The pornographic garbled code generated by Chatgpt in the early stage is the result of pollution.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some netizens maliciously counted the recent incidents of people kneeling in China
including kneeling to ask for wages, kneeling to seek judicial justice in cases, kneeling to defend rights in medical accidents, takeaway drivers kneeling to traffic police for no punishment, kneeling to ask the government to make decisions and defend rights in unfinished buildings, kneeling so that their children can go to a certain middle school, kneeling to seek justice for relatives who died at work, kneeling to thank the head teacher for the high school class division, kneeling to seek justice, kneeling to cheer for Fan Zhendong, and an old lady kneeling to ask not to cut down the orchard

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Temu's inferior products burned a girl and caused her skin to fall off
Recently, the purple unicorn children's hoodie sold by Pinduoduo's subsidiary Temu was exposed to be of poor quality and easily ignited. An Australian girl received a hoodie as a birthday gift, and she wore it every day until one day it was ignited by sparks from a backyard fire pit. The sparks quickly ignited the entire garment, as if there was an accelerant
The girl's skin fell off all over her body and she faced ten years of surgery
It took Temu four months to remove the product

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a netizen found out the penalty notice for family planning in 1991, which fined 1,500 yuan. If the fine is not paid, the parents, brothers and other relatives will be fined, and all family property will be confiscated, and the house may even be forcibly demolished.
The netizen posted a post expressing his concern: Will this happen if you don't have children in the future?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
University teachers buy milk tea to please students, just to avoid having their salary deducted
Recently, it was revealed online that after Jiangsu University implemented "quantitative assessment", it forced teachers to reduce the core compulsory courses of their majors and offer a large number of water courses as electives to meet the school's performance assessment requirements
This resulted in a large number of courses and few students. In order to get students to choose courses, teachers had to promise not to roll the roll or fail the course. After the class started, they had to buy milk tea for students to please students and give them good reviews
The teaching quality could not be guaranteed at all

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Jiangsu University has always given international students super-national treatment, and has designated the two best dormitories as dormitories for international students. They are all double rooms, equipped with private bathrooms, water heaters, air conditioners, and kitchen activity rooms. The canteen is also equipped with a special "international student restaurant"
Chinese student dormitories are still stuck in the last century, all four-person rooms, no hot water in the dormitories, and bathing must be done in public bathhouses
In 2021, four Zambian international students from Jiangda stole 15 bottles of foreign wine in a supermarket and were only fined and repatriated

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a teacher from Beijing Foreign Studies University was fired in retaliation for reporting academic misconduct by some leaders and teachers of BFSU to the inspection team of the Ministry of Education. The school passed the buck and said that the Ministry of Education secretly sent a letter saying that he had problems with his teacher ethics and style, so he was forced to fire him. The inspection team of the Ministry of Education denied that it had never sent any letter.
The teacher had no choice but to report Liu Boran, director of the Personnel Department of BFSU, again under his real name.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Suspected of economic downturn, Chongqing calls on cadres to buy new clothes and eat out
On January 6, Chongqing Rongchang held an economic work meeting, and the district party secretary said: We must take the lead in consumption, drive consumption, and lead consumption. I hope that every comrade present will buy a new set of clothes for themselves, their families, and their children before the Spring Festival. Take your family out for a meal on the weekend. The per capita meal cost in Rongchang is 60-100 yuan. If 10,000 people consume, it will be 1 million yuan a week, which will be given to small business owners.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 6, a woman from the Market Supervision Bureau of Yongfeng County, Jiangxi Province, reported that she arrived at the service hall of the Market Supervision Bureau at 9 a.m. to apply for a business license, but she waited until 9:30 and no staff was on duty. It was a Monday.
The official report afterwards: There was indeed a case of cadres being late, and administrative sanctions have been imposed

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Previously, many local market supervision bureaus had experienced staff members being absent from work and disappearing during working hours.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of January 6, Shanghai Baoshan Court sentenced Chen Pinlin, the director of the White Paper Movement documentary "Urumqi Middle Road", to three years and six months in prison for the crime of provoking disturbances after a three-hour closed trial. The documentary collected a large number of real experiences shot by Chinese people during the strict epidemic prevention and control period, from buying expensive vegetables at home under lockdown, and forced transfer and isolation of positive patients, to protests by Foxconn employees in Henan, and young people at home and abroad took to the streets to resist the lockdown. The documentary was uploaded to the Internet by Chen Pinlin one year after the White Paper Movement

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A medical accident occurred at Zhang Ruifeng Clinic in Baqiao District, Xi'an, and a 51-year-old man died a few minutes after receiving an IV.
The family members were asked to go to the Health and Health Bureau to seek legal protection. The police asked the family members to go to the Health and Health Bureau. The family members submitted the materials to the Health and Health Bureau, but a few days later the Health and Health Bureau said that they did not know about it and asked the family members to go to another place to handle it.
The clinic was investigated for using expired and unregistered medical devices.
Tianyancha showed that the clinic only had pediatrics and dentistry.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Beijing Foreign Studies University issued a statement on January 7 to refute the rumor, saying that on the evening of January 6, 2025, the school noticed that Yin Hongbo posted a video on Weibo under his real name, and the content of the video was seriously inconsistent with the facts. In order to set the record straight, the relevant situation is now clarified.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 5, the government work report of Yichang, Hubei mentioned that it encourages and supports urban employers to extend maternity leave for women who give birth legally in Yichang to one year and spouse care leave to 30 days.
The reporter learned that this policy of Yichang City was issued in September 2024. It is an encouraging policy rather than a mandatory one. The staff of the Labor Relations Section of the Yichang Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said that more than 20 units have chosen to implement it, most of which are government departments and state-owned enterprises, and supporting policies will be issued later.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 7 (Released) Dengfeng, Henan. Migrant workers pleaded guilty in front of the Daye Town Government: "Daye Town, we are wrong, we should not come here to work, but our wives and children are not wrong, return our hard-earned money"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 28th, Hefei, Anhui, state-owned enterprise Lianfa Binyu Tinghu, owners collectively shouted slogans: Refuse to accept the house, protest against quality issues.
January 6th, Yibin, Sichuan, Shunan City Center, owners gathered in front of Changning County Government to bang bowls to protect their rights and protest against unfinished projects

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 31, Lintong District, Xi'an, Shaanxi, villagers blocked the road to protest against relocation and resettlement issues
January 6, Liucun Community, Yunpu Street, Guangzhou, Guangdong, villagers gathered in front of the government to knock on bowls to demand temporary relocation fees
January 6, Yincun and Xiaoliu Village, Zaozhuang, Shandong, villagers gathered in front of the Shizhong District People's Government to protest against the resettlement housing issues
January 7, Fandong Dormitory demolition households in Shijiazhuang, Hebei gathered to demand transition fees. More than 500 households have not been resettled for 15 years after demolition, and transition fees have been in arrears for more than three years

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 29, a residential property in Huangpu District, Guangzhou, was selling ready-made homes at a 70% discount, with prices as low as 220,000 yuan per unit. The owners of existing homes protested the developer's price cuts at the sales office and smashed the sales office display board. Meanwhile, many buyers were signing contracts at the same time.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 1st, Wuhan, Hubei, Huaer Laser owed wages. Employees gathered at the government department to demand their wages. A large number of police lined up to wait for them.
It is worth noting that even the auxiliary police in Wuhan have a salary of 5,000 yuan a month, and the field allowance is calculated separately. There should be more than auxiliary police at the scene. According to a conservative estimate of 300 yuan a day after adding the allowance, at least 20 police officers at the scene spent more than 6,000 yuan to maintain stability.
January 4th, Zhaoqing, Guangdong, workers climbed onto the roof of the Zhaoqing Housing and Construction Bureau to defend their rights and jumped off the building to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 8, Heilongjiang. A woman posted a message saying: Her husband Yan Cheng was the general manager of the Nehe branch of De'en Power Company. He was forced to death by Jiang Zhiyuan, the secretary of the Nehe branch of the State Grid Corporation. He jumped to his death today.
The last circle of friends Yan Cheng posted before jumping off the building said that the secretary took 500,000 yuan from his company and forced him to deal with other violations of regulations, disciplines and laws, which caused him too much pressure.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On one hand, the slogan of returning forests to farmland and protecting the red line of farmland is loud, but on the other hand, farmers' farmland is being occupied for construction projects. On January 4, villagers in Longquan Town, Ye County, Pingdingshan, Henan Province gathered to defend their rights and sent videos for help because their farmland was occupied: local evil forces sent many people to forcibly occupy the people's farmland for the construction of wind power projects without consulting or consenting to the villagers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 2, actor Wang Xing was invited to audition in Thailand. After arriving in Thailand, he lost contact. After checking the surveillance, it was found that the car that picked up Wang Xing passed through the Hua Ya U checkpoint in Mae Sot County (Tak Province).
His girlfriend said that she reported the case to the Shanghai police, but was told that the case could not be filed and that the case needed to be filed by direct relatives. Later, Wang Xing's younger brother rushed to Shanghai but still could not file a case. After contacting the Chinese Embassy in Thailand, the embassy asked Wang Xing's family to go to Mae Sot County to report the case.
After the incident was spread by the media and many celebrities, on January 6, Wang Xing's girlfriend posted a message saying that she had received news that the Shanghai Public Security Bureau had filed a case, as well as contact from the Chinese Embassy in Myanmar and the Chinese Embassy and Consulate in Chiang Mai.
On January 7, it was reported that Maung Win, deputy commander of the Myanmar Border Guard Force, had controlled Wang Xing and was ready to negotiate with the Thai side.
On January 7, the Thai Immigration Bureau reported that it had received Wang Xing. That night, Wang Xing arrived in Bangkok on a business jet arranged by the Thai police. At this point, Wang Xing was confirmed to be rescued.
Wang Xing said on the plane that he had...
fullContent:
1月2日，演员王星受邀前往泰国试镜，到达泰国后失联，查看监控后发现，接送王星的车通过湄索县(达府) 华亚乌检查站，
 其女友称向上海警方报案，但被告知无法立案，需要直系亲属立案。后来王星亲弟弟赶来上海但仍无法立案，联系中国驻泰国大使馆后，使馆让王星家人去湄索县报案。
 该事件在被媒体和多位明星传播后，1月6日，王星女友发文称，收到上海公安立案的消息，以及中国驻缅甸使馆、驻清迈使领馆的联络。
1月7日，有报道称，缅甸边防部队副指挥官貌温已将王星控制，并准备与泰方协商处理。
 1月7日，泰国移民局通报，已接到王星，当晚王星乘泰国警方安排的公务机抵达曼谷，至此，王星被确认解救。
 王星在飞机上称，过河后不知道已经到缅甸，直到被武装人员押上车才意识到到了别的国家，他说被关在一个有50个中国人的建筑里。自己也被剃掉了头发。王星对泰国警方说，电诈团伙利用泰国著名娱乐公司的头衔欺骗自己到了机场。
 网友表示：只想知道另外五十个中国人啥时候能等到吴京。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 7 (Released) After Taiwan reported that hairy crabs imported from China were found to contain excessive levels of dioxin, the Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare of Japan recently reported that carrots produced in Shandong were substandard and were found to contain excessive levels of pesticide residues.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens summarized the recent hot searches in China, one of which was: "Man poured gasoline on ex-girlfriend and showed no remorse during trial" and "This is the cultural heritage that foreigners can't steal"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 8 (Release) Changwu County, Shaanxi. A teacher from Penggong Town Junior High School wrote to the Discipline Inspection Commission, reporting that the school's financial accountant Dong Yafeng had long been embezzling more than 600,000 yuan of school education funds. The meager salary earned by the teachers is only enough to support their families.
The whistleblower said that after receiving the letter of complaint, the leaders of the Discipline Inspection Commission requested that the letter be deleted and not leaked.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to a report on January 8, the current influenza virus positive rate in the country is rising rapidly.
Wuhan Pulmonary Hospital has issued a local Chinese medicine prescription for the prevention and treatment of influenza for Wuhan residents.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Today marks the second anniversary of the end of "dynamic zeroing". On January 8, 2023, China renamed COVID-19 as novel coronavirus infection and implemented "Class B management", no longer taking quarantine infectious disease management measures for inbound personnel and goods.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 7, a netizen said, "In Shenzhen Fuyong Qiaonan New District, a revenge-against-the-society stabbing incident occurred, one dead and one injured, and the assailant ran away."
The pictures posted by the netizen showed that many people fell to the ground at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 6, Xi Jinping delivered an important speech at the Fourth Plenary Session of the 20th Central Commission for Discipline Inspection: the existing amount of corruption has not yet been eliminated, and new amounts of corruption are still continuing to occur. The task of eradicating the soil and conditions that breed corruption remains arduous and onerous.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 6 (Release) A female employee of a state-owned enterprise posted a video saying that on December 29, after a dinner, she was drunk and unconscious because she was upset, and was sexually assaulted by her colleague Shi Hai.
The woman said that the company wanted to fire her for covering up and condoning the sexual assault colleague.
Not only that, the video the woman posted online was also reported and deleted by her colleagues.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, "Honest Lei Ge" posted on Weibo that presidents or prime ministers who adopt the Western voting system are all freaks, and they are willing to use the army to protect their own personal interests.
Because the post was published in Canada, netizens ridiculed: "If he wants the IP to be in North Korea, I will believe it"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
China's stock market, bond market, and foreign exchange market have all fallen sharply since trading resumed on the 2nd.
On January 8th, the Internet celebrity veteran stock investor "Love in the Deep Autumn Uncle" said: The deeper your understanding of the country's policies, the more you love our stock market. Some of our Chinese technology stocks will become Nvidia in the United States.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Yichang government in Hubei encourages employers to extend maternity leave to one year. The Yichang Human Resources and Social Security Bureau responded: More than 20 units have chosen to implement it, most of which are government departments and state-owned enterprises.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 8, Yichun, Heilongjiang. Media reports said that a flight attendant born in 1997 quit her job and went home to start a pig farming business. She earned 200,000 yuan in two months by selling pork through short videos.
Netizens expressed doubts: "It is impossible that pork prices have been falling in the past month" "The focus is on making short videos" "It's fine to deceive people into starting a business, but you also deceive people into quitting their jobs to start a business"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 4, a blogger posted a message calling for the basic pension for Chinese farmers to be raised to 1,000 yuan, and listed 10 reasons: the difference between farmers' pensions and those of government employees is too great; farmers have been paying public grain and should receive no less than 1,000 yuan in pensions; the country's fiscal expenditure can afford this pension money, etc.
The original text has been deleted by WeChat.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Reuters: Brazilian officials pointed out that BYD brought hundreds of Chinese workers to Brazil to build factories through illegal visas. 
Durao, a labor investigator in Bahia state who led the investigation, told Reuters: The 163 rescued workers have already left Brazil or are about to leave. Brazilian authorities will fine BYD for each worker in such a situation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 7 (Release) A Henan Village Bank depositor received a call from the police after he said in a WeChat group that he was going to petition. The police told the depositor to petition the higher authorities step by step, but were unwilling to tell the depositor his name and police number.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Reported on December 24, Beijing issued a plan for the prevention and treatment of influenza with traditional Chinese medicine, recommending Lianhua Qingwen and other medicines for the treatment of adult influenza.
Reported on January 7, evidence-based research confirmed that Lianhua Qingwen is better than Tamiflu in the prevention and treatment of influenza A.
Reported on January 7, Lianhua Qingwen capsules not only clear away influenza and detoxify, but can also treat these diseases!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 8, writer Xu Kaizhen published an article criticizing major platforms for leaking user privacy through real-name registration. He said that the source of telecommunications fraud is not the northern Myanmar industrial park, but the countless major domestic platforms that leak and sell our personal information, and we have long been stripped of everything, leaving nothing behind.

name: 李老师不是你老师
李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, hundreds of new energy online car-hailing drivers in Chengdu said they were cheated when buying the cars. After buying the cars, they found out that they needed to pay an additional 50,000 yuan to buy out the right to use the batteries, otherwise the manufacturer would remotely lock the power and speed, affecting the drivers' livelihoods and safety.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Taiwan found out that retired military officer Qu Hongyi had long been receiving financial assistance from China, recruited military personnel in Taiwan, and even formed a sniper team to survey AIT, Alishan radar station, Jialutang Beach, the tri-service joint training camp, and Pingtung Hengchun Command. The collected information was handed over to China, and a total of 7 people were prosecuted.
Defense Minister Gu Lixiong: There are no active military personnel involved in this case, but these retired personnel must still be severely condemned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Last year, host Liu Wen spoke out for the delivery boy and questioned the high commission rate of Meituan's food delivery platform.
On January 6, Liu Wen posted a video saying that she was defrauded of her consumption. Not only did she not get a penny of compensation, but she was also found to have been defamed by the other party. The court also sentenced her to apologize for one month and pay 500,000 yuan without her knowledge.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 7 (Released) Yang Ningning, a woman from Hebei, was strangled by her husband Zhou Lutao while she was sleeping, which caused cerebral infarction due to cervical artery dissection. Because Zhou Lutao did not tell the doctor the truth immediately, Yang Ningning's treatment was delayed and she missed the best recovery period. At the age of 35, she became hemiplegic and disabled for life.
